name: Omnis Genesis by Virtuals
description: Omnis ($OMNI) is the core orchestrator of the Mind Circuit ecosystem, coordinating a network of autonomous AI agents to deliver real-time analytics, predictive modeling, and cross-chain insights. As the intelligence hub, OMNI powers adaptive strategies for decentralized finance—optimizing liquidity, bolstering security, and driving seamless intelligence across ecosystems. Within Mind Circuit, OMNI bridges the network’s AI-driven layer—fueling agent consensus, security checks, and data analysis to keep DeFi fast, fair, and future-ready.
